channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Satoshi-era Bitcoin awakens - 1005 BTC mined in 2010 on the move
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: 1,005 BTC valued at $29 million have been moved from an old Bitcoin wallet after 13 years, drawing parallels to recent dormant BTC movements.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Banning ransomware payments: An attractive but dangerous idea
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Christos Makridis
item.description: The U.S. and Australia are considering banning ransomware payments, but will it solve the problem, or harm people and destroy businesses?

item.title: Why is Litecoin’s price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is Litecoin price down today
item.description: Litecoin's price is down today, partly due to the "sell the news" sentiment following its Aug. 2 halving.

item.title: ZetaChain raises $27M in equity round to enable chain-agnostic interoperability
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Participants in the round include Blockchain.com, Sky9 Capital, Jane Street Capital, VistaLabs, Human Capital, Vy Capital, CMT Digital and other investors.

item.title: 3AC founders fined by Dubai regulator over OPNX exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: OPNX CEO Leslie Lamb and executives Kyle Davies, Su Zhu and Mark Lamb were all issued a $58,000 fine for violating marketing regulations in the emirate.

item.title: BitGo raises $100M after losing lawsuit against Galaxy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: BitGo’s Series C funding featured entirely new investors based in the United States and Asia, CEO Mike Belshe said.

item.title: From the U.S. to Japan, regulators are beginning to embrace crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Singer
item.description: Switzerland, Singapore and the EU have taken the early regulatory lead, but Japan and the UAE are coming on now. Even the U.S. may be awakening.

item.title: Ledger announces U.S. PayPal integration, lets users buy crypto from within app
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Through the new integration, verified PayPal users in the United States will be able to buy BTC, ETH, BCH, and LTC directly through Ledger Live.

item.title: $26M ETH bridged: ConsenSys completes public launch of zkEVM Linea
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: ConsenSys’ Ethereum scaling network Linea is now fully public, having processed over three million transactions and bridging $26 million in Ether.

item.title: Spot Bitcoin ETF approved, but not in the US
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: This week’s episode of The Market Report discusses the spot Bitcoin ETF that just launched in Europe and why the U.S. still lags behind.

item.title: PayPal UK to halt Bitcoin purchases until early 2024
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: PayPal will temporarily halt crypto purchases in the United Kingdom starting from Oct. 1, 2023, expecting to reenable the service in early 2024.

item.title: Abu Dhabi grants virtual asset firm M2 permission to offer crypto services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Hermi De Ramos
item.category: Crypto services in the Middle East
item.description: The M2 platform will launch later in 2023, allowing UAE-based retail and institutional clients to buy, sell and custody digital assets.

item.title: FBI seizes almost $2M of crypto assets in 3 months
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Crypto assets seized by the Federal Bureau of Investigation included Bitcoin, Ether, Tether, Monero and Dai.

item.title: What is Bitcoin’s fee-to-reward ratio?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jagjit Singh
item.description: The Bitcoin network’s fee-to-reward ratio refers to the proportion of the miner’s income coming from transaction fees compared to the total block reward.

item.title: Coinbase wins NFA approval to offer Bitcoin and Ether futures in US
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Coinbase is preparing to roll out cryptocurrency futures trading for institutional investors in the United States.

item.title: Bitcoin speculators now own the least BTC since $69K all-time highs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Short-term holder supply has declined to just 2.56 million BTC, but the current Bitcoin market may be “top heavy,” warns Glassnode.

item.title: Bitcoin-friendly El Salvador sees bond returns soar to 70% in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.category: the likes of Lord Abbett & Co LLC
Neuberger Berman Group LLC and UBS Group AG have also added debt security since April.
item.description: El Salvador paid $800 million in debt at the start of the year before the maturing period, raising the confidence of investors, as President Bukele says “told you so.”

item.title: SEC v. Ripple: Judge greenlights investment banker declarant’s entry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The court seeks to address issues related to orders that rejected the SEC’s plea to seal the Hinman speech documents and Ripple’s request to seal information regarding XRP sales.

item.title: 7 ways to safely store your private keys
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore seven methods for safely storing your private keys to ensure security of digital assets.

item.title: CertiK drops findings on alleged scammer who stole $1M in crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The cybersecurity firm has still been unable to determine the actual names or identities of the hackers despite the findings.

item.title: OpenAI says ChatGPT-4 cuts content moderation time from months to hours
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: ChatGPT-4’s predictions can refine smaller models for handling extensive data, improving content moderation in several ways.

item.title: Uzbekistan permits two banks to issue crypto cards
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Kapital Bank and Ravnaq Bank got approval from the National Agency for Perspective Projects to participate in the digital sandbox of crypto regulation.

item.title: US House Democratic coalition creates AI working group
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Representative Derek Kilmer will chair the Artificial Intelligence Working Group, which is aimed at introducing “sensible, bipartisan” policies for AI technology.

item.title: Crypto mining lobby group to dispel misconceptions in Washington DC: Founder
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: The crypto mining industry is getting a dedicated lobby group aimed at opening up discussions with lawmakers in Washington.

item.title: Stellar dips into treasury to buy minority stake in MoneyGram
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The financial details weren’t disclosed, but the investment gave the Stellar Development Foundation a seat on MoneyGram’s board of directors.

item.title: Caroline Ellison’s list of ‘Things Sam Is Freaking Out About’ could be used in trial
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.category: Things Sam Is Freaking Out About
item.description: The prosecution intends to use Caroline Ellison's personal memos alongside a trove of other evidence against Sam Bankman-Fried at his criminal trial.

item.title: Silvergate CEO to depart amid ongoing liquidation and investor suits
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Silvergate is losing CEO Alan Lane and two other top executives as part of an ongoing wind-down of the once crypto-friendly bank.

item.title: Donald Trump’s Ethereum wallet holds $2.8M, new statement shows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The recent disclosure ups the figure disclosed in earlier records that said Trump held between $250,000 to $500,000 in an Ethereum wallet.

item.title: Illuvium's collapsing token represents the problems with GameFi
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Takuya Tsuji
item.description: GameFi developers have been focused on raking in money — and they've forgotten that they need to make games fun in order to win over players.
